name: Bitter in the Tropics
ingredients:
- Crushed ice and regular ice cubes
- 1 1/2 ounces Lyre’s Italian Orange, or more if needed to top
- 1 1/2 ounces fresh lime juice
- 1 ounce orgeat (see related recipe)
- Sanbitter Aperitivo soda, to top (may substitute with more of the Lyre’s)
- 1 lime wheel, for garnish
steps:
- 1 Fill a rocks glass with crushed ice
- 2 Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then add the Lyre’s, lime juice and orgeat
- 3 Shake hard to chill, then pour over the crushed ice
- 4 Add a little more crushed ice on top, as needed to create a little mound above the rim of the glass, then drizzle gently with an ounce or so of the Sanbitter soda
- 5 Garnish with a lime wheel and serve
author: Spirits columnist M Carrie Allan
